description:
Jonouchi is cornered by a group of sinister Rare Hunters who force Jonouchi into a duel where if Jonouchi loses, the Rare Hunters get his precious Red-Eyes B. Dragon!  Though Jonouchi pummels his foes with his mighty monster armada, eliminating life points isn’t the only path to victory…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ghouls Attack: Red-Eyes B. Dragon Targeted
Ghouls Kyoushuu Nerawareta Red Eyes Black Dragon
Traqué par les pilleurs de l`ombre
グールズ強襲 狙われた真紅目黒竜[レッドアイズブラックドラゴン]
